description: Regional Park with many trails.  Pick up a map at park headquarters.  GPS track is up the Mesa trail from the bottom to the top of the ridge. Steep climb with about 2000 ft. elevation gain.  Beautiful view of Monterey Bay and Carmel Valley from the top.
directions: From intersection of hwy 1 and Carmel Valley Rd. in Carmel go east for 10 miles.  Park is on the right (south) side.  Lots of parking.
title: Snivleys Ridge, Garland Park
